definitions.definition: A poisonous compound present in the foxglove ( Digitalis lanata ) and other plants. It is a steroid glycoside and is used in small doses as a cardiac stimulant .

main_definition: ( biochemistry , pharmacology ) A poisonous compound present in the foxglove ( Digitalis lanata ) and other plants. It is a steroid glycoside and is used in small doses as a cardiac stimulant .
